summary:

The ability to be a good post-editor is not linked with an individual's attitude towards MT. 

The ability to be a good post-editor should always be linked with an individual's attitude towards MT.

Bias towards MT can lead to translation tasks taking more time and costing more.

Bias against MT will never lead to translation tasks taking more time and costing more.

MT and PE will never be included into translator training programmes in universities.

Understanding when and how MT should be used is something translators should know instincively.
